thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Deidre Roop

author: Deidre Roop
title: Deidre Roop
text: My interaction started over the phone asking for information and explaining my situation. Juan was very courteous over the phone and very personable when I arrived at the car shop. Throughout the whole experience he stayed professional, honest, took excellent care of what I needed in a vehicle, he explained the whole process as we went through it, answered my questions fully. I noticed that all the employees had a great attitude, you could tell they enjoyed their job and customers. I would definitely recommend Drive Time to friends and family and I will be a return customer for my next vehicle.
